briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Naltrexone SR/Bupropion SR and Placebo in Overweight and Obese Subjects Participating in an Intensive Behavior Modification Program
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Naltrexone Sustained Release (SR)/Bupropion SR and Placebo in Subjects With Obesity Participating in a Behavior Modification Program

interventions.name: Naltrexone SR 32 mg/ bupropion SR 360 mg/ day

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a combination of naltrexone SR and bupropion SR is safe and effective in treating obesity and leads to greater weight loss when given with a group lifestyle modification program than with group lifestyle modification alone.

primaryOutcome.measure: Co-primary: Body Weight- Mean Percent Change
